attributes.action: Legislate to give the disabled facilities to have VAT exemption.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the majority of Disabled people have limited incomes such legislation would help their resources stretch a little further. This could provide a lot of benefit for those having to exist on low incomes in lower gas and electricity bills, transport costs etc. The reality is that if a disabled person purchases a low level shower tray it is VAT free but a new boiler to provide the hot water and heating for it is not
